problems.title: Maximum Circular Subarray Sum
problems.description:
Find the maximum sum of a circular subarray. A circular subarray means the array can wrap around, i.e., the last element connects to the first element.

Input Format:
First line contains n, the size of array.
Second line contains n space-separated integers.

Output Format:
Print "The maximum circular sum in the above array is: X" where X is the maximum circular subarray sum.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
9
10 8 -20 5 -3 -5 10 -13 11

Sample Output
The maximum circular sum in the above array is: 29

Explanation:
The maximum circular sum can be achieved by taking elements from index 7 to index 1 (wrapping around): 11 + 10 + 8 = 29.

testCases.expectedOutput: The maximum circular sum in the above array is: 29
The maximum circular sum in the above array is: 19
The maximum circular sum in the above array is: 17
The maximum circular sum in the above array is: -1
The maximum circular sum in the above array is: 7

hintsList: Use Kadane's algorithm for maximum subarray sum in normal array.
For circular: max of (normal max subarray sum, total sum - minimum subarray sum).
